article: Tom and Jerry were  _  . Last year they travelled in Spain . One day they came into a restaurant for lunch. They didn't know Spanish , and the waiter didn't know English,  _  . They want to have some milk and bread. At first, Tom said the word "milk"  _  times. Then, Jerry  _  it down on the table.  _  the waiter could not understand them at all. At last Tom took out  a piece of paper  and began to draw a cow. The waiter looked at it and ran out of the restaurant. "You are so  _  "said Jerry happily, "He understands us at last!" After  some time  , the waiter came back. He brought no  _  with him, but he  _  two tickets for a bullfight in his hand.
